document_data.name: ''Fire Flail''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Fire flails''''' were a type of common [[enchanted]] blunt weapons found in the glacier above the [[Dorn's Deep]].
document_data.Description: Fire flails appeared to be mundane bludgeons with sturdy [[iron]]-reinforced wooden hafts, and a metallic bludgeons attached to the haft with a chain. The bludgeons were small metal spiked balls. The entire surface of these weapons was carved with glowing arcane runes.
document_data.Powers: Apart from a potent ''+3'' enchantment was also made it significantly easier to land a hit, ''fire flails'' also had a coin-toss of a chance to dead scorching magical fire damage to its target.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1281 DR]], enchanted ''fire flails'' could be found in the [[Wyrm's Tooth Glacier]] above the Dorn's Deep, an ancient [[dwarven]] underground stronghold on the [[Spine of the World]].
